price: Ва [низ] гуфтори коҳине нест, [аммо шумо] камтар панд мегиред.
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
